argumentText:
ARGUMENT
f

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | rngisoval.1 | |- G = ( 1st ` R ) |
| 2 |  | rngisoval.2 | |- X = ran G |
| 3 |  | rngisoval.3 | |- J = ( 1st ` S ) |
| 4 |  | rngisoval.4 | |- Y = ran J |
| 5 | 1, 2, 3, 4 | #P_rngoisoval | |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ S e. RingOps ) -> ( R RngIso S ) = { f e. ( R RngHom S ) | f : X -1-1-onto-> Y } ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_eleq2d | |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ S e. RingOps ) -> ( F e. ( R RngIso S ) <-> F e. { f e. ( R RngHom S ) | f : X -1-1-onto-> Y } ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_f1oeq1 | |- ( f = F -> ( f : X -1-1-onto-> Y <-> F : X -1-1-onto-> Y ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_elrab | |- ( F e. { f e. ( R RngHom S ) | f : X -1-1-onto-> Y } <-> ( F e. ( R RngHom S ) /\ F : X -1-1-onto-> Y ) ) |
| 9 | 6, 8 | #P_syl6bb | |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ S e. RingOps ) -> ( F e. ( R RngIso S ) <-> ( F e. ( R RngHom S ) /\ F : X -1-1-onto-> Y ) ) ) |
